channel.title: Starter command help

item.title: Starter command help
item.dc:creator: @Power_For_It Power For It
item.description:
@Power_For_It wrote:


If it helps the source is devolution 7 and I keep getting this error every time I try to add the starter command.

Also heres what im trying to add in the client.java for the command

[code]
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 25000000);
addItem(392, 15000);
addItem(6528, 1);
addItem(554, 20000);
addItem(555, 20000);
addItem(565, 20000);
addItem(556, 20000);
addItem(557, 20000);
addItem(560, 20000);
addItem(561, 20000);
addItem(562, 20000);
addItem(563, 20000);
addItem(566, 20000);
addItem(558, 20000);
sendMessage(“Allstar-Scape Starter Package”);
(“starter = 1”);
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (“starter == 1”) {
sendMessage(“Sorry.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " Is a noob and is trying to get a extra starter!! :p");

        }[/code]

Read full topic
